description: The fanatical leader of the secret society http://anidb.net/ch1579 [Blue Cosmos], which seeks to exterminate all Coordinators. Azrael is also the president of a major weapons manufacturing conglomerate and a director of the Defense Industry Association, and as a result he has great influence over the leadership of the http://anidb.net/ch1542 [Earth Alliance]. After he convinces the Alliance to attack the neutral http://anidb.net/ch1501 [Orb Union], Azrael then accompanies the invasion force to supervise the operation and observe his newest weapons in action.
name: Muruta Azrael
